function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improperly configured, maintained, or cleaned ventilation system","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance, cleaning, and configuration checks of the ventilation system","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ventilation monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Lack of outdoor air circulation and constant air movement","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Increase the amount of outdoor air and ensure constant air movement within the building","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Failure to follow additional protective measures such as wearing masks, gloves, and practicing physical distancing","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Enforce and promote the use of masks, gloves, hand hygiene, surface cleaning, and physical distancing","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment (PPE), hand hygiene stations, surface disinfectants","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"}]}
